resources.string: Enter the name of a Professor
Enter an idea for an app
Today was the first day of Mobile App Development with
. We started learning about Android Studio, where we made and app all about
. I wasn\'t too sure how class was going to go, since the professor seemed a little
, but it turns out that they know how to make a good app. Our professor is trying to buy multiple
, though they say it\'s definitely not because they are trying to become a drug lord. I don\'t know if I believe them or not, but I might just have to become a
too. You didn\'t hear that from me, though. I\'m so confident, I think I\'m gonna
. I just hope my Professor doesn\'t catch me
in this class. That would be embarassing.
